content: {"name": "Bessie Green Community, Inc.", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Heads up: We received a report that this location was recently visited by immigration authorities. Unfortunately, we cannot predict if this will happen again, and we encourage you to be careful. Please reach out to our helpline if you\u2019d like to find a different resource.\n\nEntrance is in the side door of the church", "email": "", "url": "https://bessiegreen.org/food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "510 Broad Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Central Ward", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07102", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7441722, "longitude": -74.16908959999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(973) 803-6015", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
